message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $1000000.  I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident it will be a great asset for you.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $800000 is a good starting point,  I'm looking for a price that reflects its full potential. How about we meet in the middle at $900000?  I'm confident this price will be a great investment for you.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers, so how about $850000?
